nodes.text: Star Wars Adventures 26 is the twenty-sixth issue of the canon comic book anthology series Star Wars Adventures. It is comprised of the stories "Life Lessons," by Cavan Scott, and "Tales from Wild Space: Alone in the Dark," by Adam Christopher. The issue was published on September 25, 2019 by IDW Publishing.

Witness one of the many lessons Rey learned from Luke Skywalker during her time on Ahch-To. Plus, in an all-new installment of Tales from Wild Space, Resistance pilot Tallie teaches her squad how to overcome their fears.
